title: unable to connect to chat
body: for some reason i cannot connect to chat... so i cant play with my friends and cant spectate their games or anything like that! i tryed all the solutions i found non of them worked! i seriously dont know what to do...

replies.body: The issue your experiencing may be due to your network having an issue connecting to our chat servers.  We have a [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article with some steps that I hope may resolve this for you.  Please let me know if you have any questions!
aperantly the problem is with my ip... i dont think i can change it but i guess ill have to deal with with it :/

[EUNE servers are still experiencing technical difficulties.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/GMBK2qYG-eune-summoners-riot-is-aware-of-your-login-connectivity-difficulties)

I'm not sure if a fix for this will be included in Patch 6.15 Tomorrow, but let us know if your issue persists after the patch.

Note: Using a VPN (which would change your IP) or asking your ISP to change your IP (or just restarting your modem if you use a Dynamic IP) will fix the problem (as you mentioned).
My friend stevietipi06 is having the same problem I was wondering if you could help him fix it? He cant invite any of us to games or anything.
i still have the problem so i guess im gonna have to contact the isp :/ thanks anyway
